about.title: A Center for Knowledge & Spiritual Growth
about.description1: Since our inception, Jamia Kafilia Sunnia has been dedicated to blending traditional Islamic values with modern educational standards. We believe in empowering the next generation with the tools they need to succeed in both this world and the hereafter.
about.description2: Our campus provides a serene environment for learning, with dedicated facilities for Hifz, Alim courses, and general education, alongside our commitment to sheltering and educating orphans free of cost.

founder.quote: Service to humanity is service to Allah.
founder.description: We established Jamia Kafilia with a vision to create a sanctuary where knowledge meets compassion. Our goal is not just to teach, but to nurture souls that will brighten the world with their character and service. Every child here is a trust from Allah, and we strive to honor that trust every day.

programs.title: Our Institutes & Programs
programs.subtitle: Providing comprehensive Islamic and modern education to nurture future leaders.

hifz.title: Hifz-ul-Quran
hifz.description: A dedicated program for memorizing the Holy Quran with proper Tajweed under expert Huffaz.

alim.title: Alim Course
alim.description: Comprehensive Islamic scholarship program covering Hadith, Fiqh, and Arabic literature.

primary.title: Primary School
primary.description: Modern academic curriculum (Math, Science, English) integrated with moral values.

orphanage.title: Orphanage
orphanage.description: Complete care, shelter, and education for orphans. Be their sponsor today.

activities.title: Beyond the Classroom
activities.description: Education at Jamia Kafilia goes beyond textbooks. We engage our students in a variety of extracurricular activities to build character, leadership, and physical well-being. From debates to sports, our students shine in every field.

service.title: Community Service
service.desc: Cleaning drives and helping the needy.

final_cta.title: Your Contribution Can Change a Life
final_cta.subtitle: Join our mission to provide education, food, and shelter to those who need it most. Every donation counts towards building a better Ummah.
